text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo eric tRUMPf working his propaganda BS just like his daddy. 
eric’s optimistic forecast on fox news sounds familiar, it should. His father said back in February that the coronavirus would “disappear” one day “like a miracle.”
After November elections.

                WTF!!
